channel.title: How geeky is Bill Gates>?
channel.description:
Everyone wants to know how geeky he really is, Guess what! i Have the Awnser!
[size=30pt][████████████] 100% [/size]
[center][img]http://img96.imageshack.us/img96/3687/geekcomiciu3.jpg[/img][/center]

item.title: How geeky is Bill Gates>?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:43, topic:48841”][quote author=juju link=topic=68493.msg846018#msg846018 date=1170244767]

From the interviews of him that I’ve seen he seems pretty socially inept(aka, geeky).

Go on a tv station in front of the world, hold an interview, and come out of it looking not geeky.

You’d think with the billions of dollars he has that’d he’d be able to hire people to teach him to speak publically.
[/quote]

He does.[/quote]
I loled at that. Typical I guess.

Read full topic

All of you chill geeze.

Where is the love.
You guys really need to be nicer to each other, no matter of how incompetent one or the other’s brain is.

My signiture should explain the cause. Thats what I blame all my problems on now

HAHAHAHAHHA

oh wow.

yeah.
cool how you insult the maker of what you’re probably using right now.

that’s like shopping in walmart &dissing on walmart the whole time.
[/quote]
Not everyone loves Jesus.Get used to it.[/quote]

That doesn’t mean you can’t love anyone else.

Yeh So what. people get bored they do weird things TADA>.< let this thread die now. and who ever the fuck brought it back up. go to hell

item.title: How geeky is Bill Gates>?

item.description:

Hes smarter than anyone here and defiantly more mature. Think, you wouldn’t be on the computer right now if it wasn’t for him. Linux wouldn’t be here. MAC wouldn’t be here…
[/quote]
Geek may be a good thing. It means hes smart. I never said he wasnt smart or geeky was a bad thing. i just made a out-of the blue comic cause’ i was bored. Yes. He is smarter than you and i and proberly mostly everyone that uses a computer. thats what i refer to “Geeky”[/quote]
Wasn’t pointed directly at you ;). But ok.
